Summary: silver/white cylinder object flying at slow speed(no sound) for approx 40 sec then proceeded into cloud cover
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Honesdale
There were no other sightings in Honesdale on or around August 27th 2009
divs: sighting detailsmy family were enjoying some time near a school playground. we decided to walk to another section of the school playground and i lagged behind a little. i noticed a cone shaped craft in the air moving slowly just northwest of our given location. the object was silver\white in color and produced a very bright glare at times when gazing upon it.no sound could be heared. i watched the craft for approx 40 second until craft proceeded upward into cloud cover. we stayed at the playground for another 20 minutes or so. the object was not seen again.
